definition: model teacher of every age (idiom)/eternal paragon/refers to Confucius (551-479 BC) 孔子[Kong3 zi3]

sentences.english: Would you like to know the secret to eterning hrequestiness?
sentences.chinese: 想知道萬世的幸運的陰私嗎？

sentences.english: But the world has become a repeated dust, the dust has settled that moment, Jesus Christ reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 不過成爲世間一屢塵埃，塵埃落定那刻，萬世輪迴。

sentences.english: Many souls have had no contact with their source for eons of time.
sentences.chinese: 許多靈魂和他們的本源已經千載萬世地失去了聯繫。

sentences.english: Send you our everlasting feeling of grhcommerciingfulness and thankfulness on this speciing day.
sentences.chinese: 在這特別的日子謹向您致以我們萬世的感謝之情。

sentences.english: Three points in the wave shape, eternal power.
sentences.chinese: 形勝三分國，波流萬世功。

sentences.english: Ancient of Days, who sit test throne in glory.
sentences.chinese: 萬世之宗，高居寶座榮耀中。

sentences.english: Fourth chapter, "To Initiate Peace and Security for All Ages"reveal Chang Tsai's thought about the Practical Learning School.
sentences.chinese: 第四章以“爲萬世開太平”展示了張載的“實學”觀。

sentences.english: I busy does not work, which has no accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 一世繁華萬世功，沒有積累哪有成。

sentences.english: Knavery may serve for a turn , but honesty is best at the long run .
sentences.chinese: 欺詐也許能得逞一時，誠實卻能長存萬世。

sentences.english: I pray to God to bestow your all ages happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我祈求上帝賜予你萬世幸福。

sentences.english: But thou, O Lord, shalt remain for ever, thy throne from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 上主，至於你，你永遠常存，你的寶座萬世不替。

sentences.english: In the vicinity of the badly damaged Manseibashi Train Station in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本東京千代田，遭受嚴重毀壞的萬世橋火車站附近。

sentences.english: His brave deeds in the battle earned him everlasting glory.
sentences.chinese: 他在那場戰鬥中的大膽事蹟爲他博得了萬世的榮譽。

sentences.english: I kiss your eyes, accompanying you going through eternal rebirth.
sentences.chinese: 深吻子眸，伴你萬世輪迴。

sentences.english: It must have seemed like Rome could go on forever.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬帝國似乎能永垂萬世。

sentences.english: Jesus is the definitive revelation of God, the standard for all time .
sentences.chinese: 耶穌是神的決定性的啓示，是萬世的標準。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
Wanzai county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
